content.rendered:
Directed by Adam Shankman

Written by Brigitte Hales. J. David Stem. David N. Weiss. Richard LaGravenese. Bill Kelly

Star Amy Adams(Giselle). James Marsden(Prince Edward). Patrick Dempsey(Robert Philip). Maya Rudolph(Malvina Monroe). Yvette Nicole Brown(Rosaleen). Idina Menzel(Nancy Tremaine). Jayma Mays(Ruby). Oscar Nuñez(Edgar). Gabriella Baldacchino(Morgan Philip). Griffin Newman(Pip (voice)). Rachel Covey(Morgan Philip (archive footage)). Kolton Stewart(Tyson Monroe).James Monroe Iglehart.Ann Harada. Matilda Firth(Bella (Little Girl)). Eleanor O’Brien(Villager). Brigid Leahy(Nervous Wife). Naoimh Morgan(Fabric Vender). Fiona Browne(Gardener / Fauna). Darren Sinden(Villager). Sean Duggan(Rumpled Dad). Ingrid Werner(Mother). Emmanuel Okoye(Fairytale Villager #1). Chloe Harris(Mover). Philip Condron(Malvina Guard). Stephanie Karam(Gardener / Flora). Edward Harrison(Father). Camille Lucy Ross(Gardener / Merryweather). Brian Law(Husband). Ellen Costa(Villager). Rendah Beshoori(Snooty Woman). Redmand Rance(Ensemble). Hiba Elchikhe(Dancer). Ellie-Mae Ratcliffe(Snooty Daughter). Jessica Lee(Society Girl #2). Karen Sampford(Villager). Eimear Morrissey(Sander). Mila Jackson(Sophia Philip). Michael McCorry Rose(Disgruntled Prince). Cairon Pearson(Villager). Betsy Picart(Wife). Lara Jackson(Sophia Philip). Mairi-Clare MacLean(Villager). Derek Carroll(Villager (uncredited))

Language English

Producers Amy Adams. Jo Burn. Barry Josephson. Sunil Perkash. Adam Shankman. Barry Sonnenfeld

Production Walt Disney Pictures. Josephson Entertainment. Right Coast Productions
